rules.install:
install -d -m 0755 $BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr install -d -m 0755 $BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/bin install -d -m 0755 $BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/sbin install -d -m 0755 $BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr/lib
ln -sf usr/bin $BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/bin ln -sf usr/sbin $BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/sbin ln -sf usr/lib $BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/lib
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
